column1: tasks
You want to find a moderately priced restaurant and it should serve bistro food. If there is no such venue how about british type of food. Make sure you get the phone number.
You are looking for a moderately priced restaurant and it should be in the south part of town. You want to know the address and postcode.
You are looking for a cheap restaurant and it should serve mediterranean food. Make sure you get the phone number and address of the venue.
